DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that adjuvant metformin use in breast cancer patients with overweight or pre-diabetes mellitus (DM) may improve their body condition including weight loss. In this study, the investigators aim to test the efficacy and safety of adjuvant metformin for operable breast cancer patients with overweight or pre-DM.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Adjuvant Metformin for Operable Breast Cancer Patients
